flavor: You carry a personal mark of an encounter with the drowâ€”perhaps a physical scar, but more likely an emotional one. What happened? No doubt this encounter intensified your hatred of the drow. But is your hatred now mixed with fear? Or is it a burning drive to exact revenge? Perhaps something about the encounter gave you a trace of compassion for the drow. Do you hope that they might one day be redeemed and rejoin the eladrin fold?
name: Eladrin - Drowscarred
